content.text: I teach kindergarten and my favorite activities are from PBS Kids and Scholastic.
Interesting, I'm my own boss and have been learning about how to use social media to advertise my business.

What do you do for fun?
I am always taking my girls to the park, and I love to travel.

It was a good experience, but I'm glad I'm done with it now.
I'm sure it was, and it's good that you're happy now.
